scripts.run: npm run-script bundle && node server/index.js run --databaseUrl mysql://porto:porto@localhost/porto --logPath /var/log/porto/porto.log
scripts.run-debug: rm -f /var/log/porto/porto.log && npm run-script bundle && node --inspect server/index.js run --databaseUrl mysql://porto:porto@localhost/porto?debug=true --logPath /var/log/porto/porto.log
scripts.test: npm run-script bundle && env ADDRESS="0.0.0.0" DATABASE_URL="mysql://porto:porto@localhost/porto?multipleStatements=true" LOG_PATH="/var/log/porto/porto.tests.log" MODULES_PATH="./node_modules" PORT="8080" STATIC_PATH="./www" istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha --dir ./www/coverage -- --bail --recursive --timeout 0 ./tests
scripts.test-debug: rm -f /var/log/porto/porto.test.log && npm run-script bundle && env ADDRESS="0.0.0.0" DATABASE_URL="mysql://porto:porto@localhost/porto?multipleStatements=true" LOG_PATH="/var/log/porto/porto.tests.log" MODULES_PATH="./node_modules" PORT="8080" STATIC_PATH="./www" mocha --bail --inspect-brk --recursive --timeout 0 ./tests
scripts.put-attendance: http PUT http://localhost:8080/api/attendance meetingId=225 userId=71 attended:=true
